1010010110110101 1011001011000001 1 -> sum: 0101100001110111, cout: 1

0000101100001011 0010101101001010 0 -> sum: 0011011001010101, cout: 0
0001000101000110 1011110100011011 1 -> sum: 1100111001100010, cout: 0
1001011101000010 0101110111111001 0 -> sum: 1111010100111011, cout: 0
1101101100101100 1100110011001110 1 -> sum: 1010011111111011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
